entry.title: Wedge AmpBIT
entry.summary:
Vendor: TheraGun
Type: G2PRO - AmpBIT
Price: 19.00

Product Details

  • Designed to use around the shoulder blade and broad fascial work
  • High density closed cell foam attachment
  • Only for the G2PRO

Specifications

  • Item Weight: 1.4 oz
  • Product Dimensions:  2.4" x 2.4" x 2.4" 

Usage

TheraGun AmpBITs are designed to withstand the most effective use and point of contact with your muscles. For that reason, we highly recommend replacing AmpBITs every 60-90 days depending on the level of use as they will wear down when used properly.

entry.title: Charger
entry.summary:
Vendor: TheraGun
Type: G2PRO - Battery/Charger
Price: 49.00

Product Details

  • The 12V charger is used for charging the TheraGun G2PRO's lithium ion battery. It has a quick charge time and allows the battery to reach a 75% charge in only 15 minutes, and a full charge in 50 minutes. The light will flash red while it is charging and will turn green when the battery is fully charged. For a longer life, charge the battery consistently to its full capacity.
  • Only use with the G2PRO LithiumIon Battery

Specifications

  • Item Weight: 14.4 oz
  • Product Dimensions:  7.9" x 3.5" x 5.7"

entry.title: LithiumTech Battery
entry.summary:
Vendor: TheraGun
Type: G2PRO - Battery/Charger
Price: 49.00

Product Details

  • LithiumTech batteries feature electronic single-cell protection that shields each cell from overcharging. LithiumTech batteries can also be charged for up to three times more cycles than a standard Ni-Cd battery. They work without memory effect, produce minimal self-discharge and weigh up to 60 percent less for all day use. Battery charge will last approximately 45 minutes, depending on usage and pressure. For longer battery life, always charge the battery to its full capacity.
  • For use with the G2PRO ONLY

Specifications

  • Item Weight: 6.4 oz
  • Product Dimensions:  1.8" x 1.8" x 3.1" 
  • Battery Style: Post
  • Battery Type: Li-Ion
  • Recharge Time: 30 minutes
  • Voltage: 10.8V
